channel.title: opinion website on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in opinion website on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Vox Logo Vox is an American entertainment website owned by Vox Media. The website was founded in April 2014 by Ezra Klein, Matt Yglesias, and Melissa Bell, and is noted for its concept of explanatory journalism. Vox’s media presence also includes a YouTube channel, several podcasts, and a show presented on Netflix. Vox has been described as left-of-center and progressive. Source
You can download theVoxlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Vox
item.description: Vox is an American entertainment website owned by Vox Media. The website was founded in April 2014 by Ezra Klein, Matt Yglesias, and Melissa Bell, and is noted for its concept of explanatory journalism. Vox’s media presence also includes a YouTube channel, several podcasts, and a show presented on Netflix. Vox has been described as left-of-center and progressive. Source
